subject: Missing part
description_text: Good evening,     I received my order on 11/17/2025, but my pedal control box is missing from the package. Please let me know how soon this matter can be resolved?

conversations.body_text: Hi WKIS Killa,    Please provide your order number, and we will look into it for you. Don't worry.

My order number is
ORDER #SSN3245


On Thu, Nov 20, 2025 at 9:21 PM support@simsonn.com
Is it possible for the missing pedal control box  to be expedited within the next few days?
Hi WKIS Killa,    We apologize for the inconvenience and will confirm and resend your order as soon as possible.

Any update on this? I just want to confirm if it will be expedited? I
didn’t receive any shipping details

On Fri, Nov 21, 2025 at 5:51 AM support@simsonn.com
Hi WKIS Killa,    Here is your logistics tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047080365792

Hi this tracking label isn’t working and I have no updates on the shipment

On Mon, Nov 24, 2025 at 3:51 AM support@simsonn.com
Hi WKIS Killa,    I apologize for not getting back to you sooner. I see the package has been delivered.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047080365792
